setstartordernumber.label: ASchroder.com Set Starting Order Number
setstartordernumber.comment:
This extension will allow you to choose your starting order number, invoice number, shipment number and credit memo number. Simply enter your chosen values in the box below, save the settings and then run 'update'. The numbers will be 9 digits long, with a prefix and then your number. If you choose a number less than 9 digits long, Magento will pad it out with 0's. Can that change yes, can it change in an hour, no. Let's keep it simple.

It is SERIOUSLY important that you don't set the number back lower than existing orders, otherwise you'll end up with duplicates, and a world of hurt - you've been warned :)

Any issues/feedback/bugs/feature requests welcome, please contact Ashley at ASchroder.com.

update.comment: This will update your increment ID's to the above numbers. Blank means leave it as it is. If any of the given numbers are lower than the values already in the database, you will see an error. If you are 100% sure you know what you're doing you can override the safety check, flip the switch below and save again before running this update.

override.label: Allow me to set my increment ID's below their current values - Trust me, I know what I'm doing.
